bulletlist: Daily meetings, not really agile at the time.. they probably are now
Javascript, jQuery, jqWidgets, Modernizr, jQuery custom extensions, HTML5, CSS3

Point was that the HTML would all be HTML5 compliant, Javascript would all be modernized and optimized and CSS would be CSS3.. basically clean everything up as much as possible with the goal of hitting compliance points to certain modern standards.

IT work (small/medium business and home)

Application installs, networking, pc repair and troubleshooting services, backup systems, office equipment procurement and installation, whatever I found interesting and could help with really.. Lots of Quickbooks and Office equipment as well as custom website setup, CMS builds, etc… This was just a way for me to work with established businesses and maintain some scope of liability.

workexperience.note: My internship and first job afterwards as I stayed on for quite a while.. interesting small technology business with a variety of service contracts, infrastructure and data management contracts, etc. Really dynamic and great place to work with a ton of interesting projects to work on and unique datacenter asserts to get involved with.
